entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 09:32 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023
